alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 1:18AM MST until January 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Yuma County, Gila River Valley, Gila Bend and Sonoran Desert National Monument. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County
